thread.title: how to make red and blue 3d

post.author: prof.doom
post.body: Hey guys I want to learn how to make red and blue 3d videos. Our college gifted us 3d active glasses . I downloaded some red and blue 3d videos and it looked so real. I felt like i should trying making one too. I heard it is not so difficult. So, can someone teach me how to make those kind of videos.

post.author: CrimsonHead
post.body: Red & Blue 3d images are called Anaglyph images, I would look for an anaglyph or stereoscopic image or video filter/converter.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
Sony Vegas has this a built in mode now: you import your left/right eye videos & it outputs red/blue video.

I think there's some tutorials for Blender on how to make them with Blender too, do a search & blendercookie.com
